qa.name: Captain Sarah Chen
qa.appearance: Athletic build, with short black hair

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the vast emptiness of space, silence became my closest companion.
json_to_edit.description: Captain Sarah Chen confronts her loneliness aboard the International Space Station.
json_to_edit.lighting: Harsh, artificial light mixed with Earth's glow
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Low hum of life support systems, occasional beeps
json_to_edit.name: Solitude in Orbit
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Captain Sarah Chen grapples with isolation while orbiting Earth, finding solace in the AI assistant ARIA.

qa.action: The International Space Station floating in the vast darkness of space, Earth visible below.

hf.action: Captain Sarah Chen floating in the observation module, gazing out at Earth.

tr.action: Sarah's eyes, reflecting the blue marble of Earth, a tear forming in zero gravity.

xc.action: Sarah working at a computer station, surrounded by various scientific instruments.

ka.action: ARIA's holographic projection appearing next to Sarah, offering companionship.

fn.action: Sarah's face, a mix of gratitude and sadness as she interacts with ARIA.

af.action: Sarah performing maintenance on the exterior of the station during a spacewalk.

qo.action: Sarah returning to the airlock, the vastness of space behind her.

edit_command: Add a new shot after every three existing shots, showing the passage of time through Earth's changing appearance. Don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: In the vast emptiness of space, silence became my closest companion.
updated_json.description: Captain Sarah Chen confronts her loneliness aboard the International Space Station.
updated_json.lighting: Harsh, artificial light mixed with Earth's glow
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Low hum of life support systems, occasional beeps
updated_json.name: Solitude in Orbit
updated_json.scene_summary: Captain Sarah Chen grapples with isolation while orbiting Earth, finding solace in the AI assistant ARIA.

qa.action: The International Space Station floating in the vast darkness of space, Earth visible below.

hf.action: Captain Sarah Chen floating in the observation module, gazing out at Earth.

tr.action: Sarah's eyes, reflecting the blue marble of Earth, a tear forming in zero gravity.

zy.action: Earth seen from the station's viewport, transitioning from day to night, city lights flickering on.

xc.action: Sarah working at a computer station, surrounded by various scientific instruments.

ka.action: ARIA's holographic projection appearing next to Sarah, offering companionship.

fn.action: Sarah's face, a mix of gratitude and sadness as she interacts with ARIA.

wx.action: Earth visible through a window, seasons visibly changing over landmasses as clouds swirl.

af.action: Sarah performing maintenance on the exterior of the station during a spacewalk.

qo.action: Sarah returning to the airlock, the vastness of space behind her.

uv.action: Earth seen from space, a full day-night cycle passing rapidly, emphasizing the passage of time.

label.rationale: we will add three new shots to the scene, each showing the passage of time through earth's changing appearance. these new shots will be inserted after every three existing shots, maintaining the original order and content of the existing shots. this will enhance the sense of time passing and emphasize the loneliness of space, while also providing visual breaks in the narrative. we'll update the json_to_edit by adding these new shots, adjusting the number_of_shots, and updating the list_display_order accordingly.

value.action: Earth seen from the station's viewport, transitioning from day to night, city lights flickering on.
Earth visible through a window, seasons visibly changing over landmasses as clouds swirl.
Earth seen from space, a full day-night cycle passing rapidly, emphasizing the passage of time.
